snippet: Irwin Susskind, a Brooklyn Heights resident for 42 years, says he likes antique clothing and gets a lot of his clothes at thrift shops and street sales.
abstract: Longtime Brooklyn Heights resident Irwin Susskind, a retired graphic designer, has been finding stylish, quality clothing at neighborhood's thrift shops and street sales for over 30 years.
lead_paragraph: Irwin Susskind, a Brooklyn Heights resident for 42 years, says he likes antique clothing and gets a lot of his clothes at thrift shops and street sales.

headline.seo: Refined Vintage Fashion in Brooklyn Heights
headline.main: Video: Never Going Out of Style
